price: Watanong'onezana wao kwa wao: Hamkukaa ila siku kumi tu.
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
